column2: "EWURADZE
column3: wo mu na medze mo werɛ hyɛ; mma mma m’enyim nngu ase dabiarada: Gye me wɔ wo tsenenee mu."

column2: "Brɛ w’aso adze ma me; gye me ntsɛmara: Yɛ ɔbotantsim ma me
column3: na mo guansumabew dɛ ebɛgye me."

column2: "Na ɔwo nye mo botan na m’akoban; Dɛm ntsi
column3: kyerɛ me kwan na kegya me

column2: "Yi me fi efir a woesua no nsumaa mu no mu; Na ɔwo nye m’akoban."
"Wo nsamu na medze mo sunsum hyɛ: EWURADZE
"Mikyir hɔn a wodzi ator egyangyandze ekyir: Na emi dze
"M’enyi bɛgye na medzi ehurusi wɔ wo mbɔbɔrhu mu
column3: Na ɔwo ahwɛ m’ahohia; Ɔwo ehu me kra wɔ amandzehu mu:"

column2: "Na ɔwo annka me annhyɛ ɔtamfo no nsamu: Ɔwo edze m’anan esi mbrɛ hɔ tserɛw."
"EWURADZE
column4: na mowɔ ahokyer mu: Awerɛhow ntsi m’enyiwa resɛɛ
column6: me kra na me nyimpadua so."

column2: "Na mo nkwa rohwer wɔ yaw mu
column3: me mfe so wɔ apensi mu: M’ahoɔdzen apa wɔ m’emumuyɛ ntsi
column4: na me mbiew afomfɔn wɔ m’atamfo ntsi."

column2: "M’atamfo nyinara ntsi mayɛ ɔsesɛba
column4: mo sɔnmufo so moho afon hɔn
column5: na mo ho ayɛ hu ama m’amanyimfo. Hɔn a wohu me guado no guan me."

column2: "Nkorɔfo werɛ efir me dɛ owufo efi adwen mu: Metse dɛ senaba bobɔe."
"Na matse dodowara hɔn huhuhuhu
column3: Ihu etwa mo ho ehyia: Ber a wɔrokɔ me tsir do apam no
column4: Wɔhyehyɛɛ dɛ wobeyi mo nkwa efi hɔ."

column2: "Naaso emi dze
column4: na medze mo werɛ hyɛ wo mu: Mese dɛ

column2: "Me mber wɔ wo nsamu: Gye me fi m’atamfo nsamu
column3: na hɔn a wohiahia mo ho no."

column2: "Tsew w’enyim kyerɛ w’akowaa: Gye me nkwa wɔ w’adɔyɛ mu."
"EWURADZE
column4: na mesu afrɛ wo: Ma ndzebɔnyɛfo enyi nto

column2: "Ma atorfo ano ntɔ mmum; Hɔn a wɔdze ntsɛn na enyiammbɔho keka nsɛm
column3: Nsɛm a ɔyɛ dzen tsia tseneneenyi no a."

column2: "Ao
column3: mbrɛ wo papayɛ a edze esie ama hɔn a wosuro wo no dua dɔɔ so a! Dza ɔwo ayɛ ama hɔn a woguan toa wo wɔ nyimpa mba enyim no a."

column2: "W’enyim ehuntsae mu na edze hɔn bohuntsa efi nyimpa tsirdo apam mu: Ɔwo na edze hɔn huntsa nsumaa mu wɔ w’asesee mu fi gyirama ntokwadzi ho."
"Nhyira nka EWURADZE
column3: Osiandɛ ɔakyerɛ me n’adɔyɛ nwanwa no
column4: wɔ kurow a ahohia wɔ hɔ mu."

column2: "Na emi dze
column5: Woetwa me efi w’enyi do: Naaso aber a musui mefrɛɛ wo no
column6: ɔwo itsiee mo nkotoserɛ ndze no."

column2: "Hom ndɔ EWURADZE
column3: hom n’ahotseweefo nyinara: EWURADZE kora nokwardzifo no do
column4: Na otua nyia ɔyɛ ntsɛn no kaw berdzedzeedze."

column2: "Hom nhyɛ dzen
column4: Hom a hom enyi da EWURADZE do nyinara."
